ingredients: rice, lemon, turmeric, mustard seeds, curry leaves
recipe_steps:
1. Cook rice and let it cool.
2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies, and turmeric.
3. Add lemon juice and salt.
4. Mix with rice and serve.

ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, garlic, olive oil
recipe_steps:
1. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in olive oil.
2. Add chopped tomatoes and simmer until thick.
3. Crack eggs on top and cover until cooked.
4. Garnish with herbs and serve hot.

ingredients: rice, saffron, chicken, shrimp, peas, bell pepper
recipe_steps:
1. Sauté chicken and shrimp with spices.
2. Add rice and saffron-infused broth.
3. Simmer without stirring until rice is cooked.
4. Garnish with peas and bell pepper.

ingredients: coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken, basil, eggplant
recipe_steps:
1. Fry green curry paste in oil.
2. Add chicken pieces and cook until sealed.
3. Pour in coconut milk, add vegetables and simmer.
4. Garnish with Thai basil and serve with rice.

ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese, black pepper
recipe_steps:
1. Cook spaghetti and save some pasta water.
2. Fry pancetta until crispy.
3. Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
4. Combine all off heat, adding pasta water to create a sauce.

1. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in olive oil.
2. Add chopped tomatoes and simmer until thick.
3. Crack eggs on top and cover until cooked.
4. Garnish with herbs and serve hot.

ingredients: rice, saffron, chicken, shrimp, peas, bell pepper
recipe_steps:
1. Sauté chicken and shrimp with spices.
2. Add rice and saffron-infused broth.
3. Simmer without stirring until rice is cooked.
4. Garnish with peas and bell pepper.

ingredients: coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken, basil, eggplant
recipe_steps:
1. Fry green curry paste in oil.
2. Add chicken pieces and cook until sealed.
3. Pour in coconut milk, add vegetables and simmer.
4. Garnish with Thai basil and serve with rice.

ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese, black pepper
recipe_steps:
1. Cook spaghetti and save some pasta water.
2. Fry pancetta until crispy.
3. Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
4. Combine all off heat, adding pasta water to create a sauce.

ingredients: rice, lemon, turmeric, mustard seeds, curry leaves
recipe_steps:
1. Cook rice and let it cool.

3. Add lemon juice and salt.
4. Mix with rice and serve.
